tools.name: Amazon EC2
tools.description: Elastic Compute Cloud provides resizable compute capacity in the cloud, allowing users to run virtual servers for various workloads

tools.name: Amazon S3
tools.description: Simple Storage Service offers object storage with high durability, availability, and virtually unlimited scalability

tools.name: AWS Lambda
tools.description: Serverless compute service that runs code in response to events and automatically manages the underlying resources

tools.name: Amazon RDS
tools.description: Relational Database Service makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale relational databases in the cloud

tools.name: Azure Virtual Machines
tools.description: Create Windows and Linux virtual machines with the configurations, scale, and availability needed for applications

tools.name: Azure Storage
tools.description: Durable, highly available, and massively scalable cloud storage services including blob, file, queue, and table storage

tools.name: Azure Functions
tools.description: Event-driven serverless compute platform that solves complex orchestration problems without managing infrastructure

tools.name: Azure SQL Database
tools.description: Intelligent, scalable, relational database service built for the cloud with automated updates, provisioning, and backups

tools.name: Google Compute Engine
tools.description: Secure and customizable compute service that lets you create and run virtual machines on Google's infrastructure

tools.name: Google Cloud Storage
tools.description: Object storage for companies of all sizes with global edge-caching and high durability and availability

tools.name: Google Cloud Functions
tools.description: Event-driven serverless compute platform that runs your code without managing servers with automatic scaling

tools.name: Google BigQuery
tools.description: Serverless, highly-scalable, and cost-effective cloud data warehouse designed for business agility

tools.name: DigitalOcean
tools.description: Cloud platform focused on simplicity for developers with straightforward pricing and developer-friendly user interface

tools.name: Linode
tools.description: Cloud computing platform offering virtual private servers and other cloud services with a focus on simplicity and high performance

tools.name: Oracle Cloud
tools.description: Enterprise cloud offering computing, database, storage, and networking services with a focus on enterprise applications and autonomous capabilities

tools.name: IBM Cloud
tools.description: Full-stack cloud platform with over 170 products and services covering data, containers, AI, IoT, and blockchain

tools.name: Dropbox
tools.description: File hosting service offering cloud storage, file synchronization, and personal cloud with collaboration features

tools.name: Box
tools.description: Content management platform offering secure, enterprise-grade file sharing, collaboration, and workflow capabilities

tools.name: Microsoft OneDrive
tools.description: File hosting service operated by Microsoft that allows users to store files and personal data in the cloud

tools.name: Google Drive
tools.description: File storage and synchronization service developed by Google that allows storing files in the cloud with real-time collaboration
